001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.net;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FlowAssembler;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
007import java.util.Objects;
008import java.util.Optional;
009
010/**
011 * Generic payload assembler that treats each TCP segment payload as an independent byte stream.
012 * <p>Infrastructure adapter for {@link FlowAssembler}. Thread-safe if the supplied
013 * {@link MetricsPort} is thread-safe.
014 *
015 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
016 */
017public final class PayloadFlowAssemblerAdapter implements FlowAssembler {
018  private final MetricsPort metrics;
019  private final String metricsPrefix;
020
021  /**
022   * Creates a payload assembler adapter.
023   *
024   * @param metrics metrics sink for recording assembler statistics
025   * @param metricsPrefix prefix applied to metric keys; defaults to {@code "flowAssembler"}
026   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code metrics} is {@code null}
027   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
028   */  public PayloadFlowAssemblerAdapter(MetricsPort metrics, String metricsPrefix) {
029    this.metrics = Objects.requireNonNull(metrics, "metrics");
030    this.metricsPrefix = (metricsPrefix == null || metricsPrefix.isBlank())
031        ? "flowAssembler"
032        : metricsPrefix;
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Emits a {@link ByteStream} for each non-empty payload while recording metrics.
037   *
038   * @param segment segment to evaluate; may be {@code null}
039   * @return stream slice when payload is non-empty; otherwise empty
040   * @implNote Emits one {@link ByteStream} per segment; callers perform higher-level reassembly.
041   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
042   */  @Override
043  public Optional<ByteStream> accept(TcpSegment segment) {
044    if (segment == null) {
045      metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".nullSegment");
046      return Optional.empty();
047    }
048
049    byte[] payload = segment.payload();
050    if (payload.length == 0) {
051      metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".emptyPayload");
052      return Optional.empty();
053    }
054
055    metrics.increment(metricsPrefix + ".payload");
056    metrics.observe(metricsPrefix + ".bytes", payload.length);
057    ByteStream slice =
058        new ByteStream(
059            segment.flow(),
060            segment.fromClient(),
061            payload,
062            segment.timestampMicros());
063    return Optional.of(slice);
064  }
065}
066
